articles.title: Herbalife overcomes solubility barriers of curcumin to roll out new immune-support supplement - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: Herbalife has incorporated nanotechnology to develop a new immune-support supplement, Immunoturmeric, which recently debuted in Indonesia and will soon be available in the other Asia-Pacific markets.
articles.content:
This product adds to Herbalifes portfolio of supplements that are targeted at strengthening the immune system.

articles.title: Filipina Johanne Siy, head chef of Singapore's Lolla, named Asia's Best Female Chef 2023 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: She is the first Singapore-based chef to win this prestigious award from the Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants Academy, which recognises women who have made their mark in the gastronomy world.
articles.content:
Pioneer Filipina chef Johanne Siy of Lolla restaurant in Singapores Ann Siang Road has been named Asias Best Female Chef 2023.
